text: With so many classic TV shows being revived - - from Roseanne to Murphy Brown to 24 - - many fans have wondered if Buffy the Vampire Slayer would ever return, whether as a reboot or a revival. As it turns out, though, they aren't the only ones. Speaking at the INTV Conference in Jerusalem ( via Variety ), Fox TV group chair Gary Newman says Buffy is always on the studio's mind. ` ` I think if you look in our library, Buffy is probably the most ripe show we have for bringing back,'' he says.
